data.Name: MARINA
data.Bio: There are several artists with this name: 1) Marina Lambrini Diamandis (Greek: Μαρίνα-Λαμπρινή Διαμάντη) is a Welsh-Greek singer, known professionally as MARINA (previously Marina & the Diamonds). Marina was born on the 10th October 1985 in Abergavenny, Wales. She began creating and producing her own music in 2005. In 2007, she released her debut EP, Mermaid vs. Sailor. She released her first single (a double A-side, Obsessions/Mowgli's Road) through Neon Gold Records on the 14th February 2009 Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Marina: Ancient Dreams In A Modern Land Tour
